text: 15.34 Apo 26.8, Lom 13.11, 1 Ko 6.5, Epe 5.14, 1 Te 4.5 Gos ke nɨŋɨd sawl lɨpɨm ak kelɨgɨl, yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Pen tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm ak kelɨgɨl, anɨb okok ma gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨgɨm, nɨbi ogɨnap God nop gos ma nepɨm. Nɨbi nɨgem nebeŋ gɨnɨmɨb tek lɨnɨgab agɨl, nɨbop takaw anɨb ak agebin.
